content: melting popsicles afghan karen price designed by supplies needed * 5 mm hook h * 4 caron cakes all in 1 colour or split * needle for weaving in ends between 2 colours that go together well * scissors * box or container to hold cakes side-by-side * 2 locking stitch holders finished size legend of stitches u s terminology has been 38 x 48 used through out this pattern chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch- slip_stitch space - space shell - 2 double_crochet ch1 2 double_crochet all into 1 stitch half shell - chain 3 2 double_crochet into 1st stitch at the beginning of a row or 3 double_crochet into a single at all other times pattern tips pattern repeat is multiples of 8 + 4 1 chain extra you can always remove excess stitches later don t pull your 1st chain tight 2 locking stitch holders help ensure stitches won t fall out while working with other colour 3 always be sure to turn your work clockwise to avoid twisting the two yarns 4 be sure to always capture the previous yarns colour chain-3 space when making your shell don t work behind it or in front of it work over it to literally hide it into your work 5 once you get use to the pattern you ll find that you can work both colors across the afghan together at once doing 5 or 6 shells at a time like and follow us on facebook visit our blog check us
